name: Time Traveling Toilet
description:
Your apartment only bothered to get exciting on the day you move out, with the sudden appearance of a toilet with the ability to travel to the time you first moved in. 

Explore the two separate times and join the past and present together, and perhaps something new will be gained in the process.

Story by Morg.

Coding by Mo.

Made in Twine for the 2021 Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam. Ver. 1
